title: シノビライフ 6
description: Beni and the young Kagetora are getting closer, and she seems to be finding a place for herself in his ninja village. But all is not what it seems in this quiet farm town, and ninjas have been dropping like flies during their missions! Rumors start to spread that Renkaku is a spy. What happens when the only person who can tell if someone is lying might be a liar? The grown Kagetora is dealing with problems of his own, unable to track Beni down, and with Hitaki right on his tail!
author: Shoko Conami
